__e: I don't know about P.I.s. Never feel like I can trust them.
Well, I lied about being in New York 'cause I thought you two were P.I.s.
You want me to get one of the private investigators I work with to dig around a little bit,find out about the guy?
These people are police detectives. They wanna ask you some questions.

I walked down the hall to shake his hand, this was, you know, back when he was shaking hands. And there were seven detectives lined up outside his office just waiting to run cases by him, just to see what he thought, just to pick his brain.
You've cut me to the quick. Only the prince of detectives, you say?
You mean the detectives in Manhattan have no idea where she's gone?
But we're here to be detectives, and you know what you need to be a detective?
I've also got pot, which is another way that real detectives pass the time.
The detectives need to know whose idea this whole thing was.
I just wanted to let you know the detectives are done with you for now.
Took the detectives two years to cover the same ground he'd covered in a week.
